id: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald First Fan Reactions Roundup
paragraph: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald just had a "fans first" preview screening at Universal Studios Hollywood, and reactions have been largely positive.It’s important to note that this is a fan screening, so many in attendance were already massive fans of the franchise. Still, if those who enjoyed the mainline Harry Potter films are on board with this spinoff sequel, it could be a positive sign for those on the fence about seeing the film.  For more on The Crimes of Grindelwald, check out how much the sequel is expected to make in its opening weekend, and how a recent trailer confirmed long-held fan theories about Nagini.Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald  hits theaters on November 16, 2018.Colin Stevens is a freelance writer for IGN. Follow him on Twitter.We encourage you to read our updated PRIVACY POLICY and COOKIE POLICY.
